testcase.name: testQuery
testcase.error:

### The error may exist in com/wangrui/bbt/dao/GoodsDao.java (best guess) ### The error may involve com.wangrui.bbt.dao.GoodsDao.query-Inline ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: SELECT select * from t_goods WHERE ( type_id = ?) ### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00936: 缺失表达式
